channel.title: champlain on Shoals
channel.description: Recent content in champlain on Shoals

item.title: Tradewinds
item.description: Yesterday a friend asked for my help hauling his boat closer to shore, along Lake Champlain in the Northern part of town. The recent flooding elsewhere in Vermont had now reached the lake, and he was worried that the rising waters would carry off his summer recreation plans. So I pitched in. Wading in at the debris-filled shore, I spotted a bright, straight-edged object in the water, and hauled it out.
